name: chaoslab
description:
You are a soldier in the army's test labs.

But there is a mistake and now you have to stop the mess you're creating.

Intro:

Your weapon can't stop shooting, find the scientist who can help you, by following the green flags. But don't kill anyone on your way.

use W, A, S, D to navigate or the Arrow keys.

Have fun.

Made by

EnderGnar#2845 & T1geR#2209

devinitli on Twitter

Made for the GMTK Game Jam

OUT OF CONTROL 2020
